name: prefix_ithome
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.ithome.com") {
div.con-recom,
div#hd_float,
div#qrcode,
li#side_pos1,
div.shareto,
div#a2hlindex,
a.zhaopin1,
p.content_copyright,
.adsbygoogle,
div.related_post,
div.rela-post,
div#side_func
{
  display:none!important;
}
}
